programme.title: Around the World in 80 Weighs - EP 3
programme.desc: If current trends continue, a quarter of the world's population will be obese by 2035; it is a global crisis. The six tourists come face-to-face with the horrors of the obesity crisis in different parts of the world and confront the alarming truth of what may await them if they don't tackle their own challenges. At the end of each week, participants are weighed together on a giant scale to see if their hard work trying to lose weight - and the shocking things they have seen - has paid off.

Prisa is matched with Gala, but Prisa has just discovered that Gala is cheating on her with her best friend. Gala also wants to take over Prisa's family's sports center. Prisa begins to fall for Arya because of the events that always get them into trouble.

programme.title: MAKAN TEROOOS - EP 16

programme.title: THE SULTAN ENTERTAINMENT - EP 19

programme.title: Perempuan Tidak Bercerita TibaTiba Idola
programme.desc: A beautiful girl named Mika. It is said that Mika, who is a member of a motorcycle gang, suddenly becomes the target of slander and makes her have to run away or disguise herself. Finally, Mika disguises herself as a principal at an elementary school, with the new name Laila. Actually, the principal named Laila has died. Then Mika takes the opportunity to disguise herself.

programme.title: Awal Mulanya Gimana Mba Taylor?

programme.title: Diam Diam Menyusun Rencana Bergerak Salah Semua
programme.desc: Wanting to meet Ardi, Gita becomes hypnotized, causing her to lose her memory. Luckily, Bayu comes to her rescue.

programme.title: AA Makaroni Spek Lucu Anett
programme.desc: Riska's image suffers due to a viral video of her arguing with Arka. Arka accuses Riska of nearly hitting Silvi (Freya). To restore her image and reputation, Riska must gain Arka's sympathy.

programme.title: PARA PENCARI TUHAN 17 - EP 22
programme.desc: With the theme of Heaven's Fugitive, Bang Jack has to deal with debt collectors who have minimal religious knowledge to teach them to become sharia-compliant debt collectors.

programme.title: Ketika Level Tertinggi Cinta Adalah Soto Ayam
programme.desc: The story of a reckless guy named Raga who struggles to graduate from college because he has become a perpetual student. Raga has to meet a girl named Alin who sells soto and also studies at the same college as him. Their awkwardness always steals the spotlight, and eventually, they fall in love with each other.

programme.title: CINTA SUCI - EP 20
programme.desc: Suci, who is entangled in problems, must marry Marcel because she desperately needs money for the medical expenses of her husband and children, Aditya and Ronny, so that they can both stay alive. On the other hand, Monica hates Suci because she thinks Suci forced Marcel to marry her.

programme.title: Mau Mendua Tapi Takut FYP
programme.desc: Bulan and her younger sister, Bintang, went to Jakarta, where Aunt Dita promised them jobs. But who would have thought that Aunt Dita was lying and would turn Bulan and Bintang into masseuses? Of course, Bulan and Bintang refused. Until Bulan and Bintang met Grandpa, who turned out to be Banyu's grandfather.

programme.title: Samudra Cinta - EP 474
programme.desc: The love story between Ocean and Cinta, which had always quarreled before. Gradually, they became friends and slowly grew in love between them. But a secret between the Cinta family and the Samudra family makes their relationship complicated because there is a big secret about Cinta that can ruin their relationship.

programme.title: CINTA AMARA - EP 148
programme.desc: An engineered tragedy left 6-month-old Aziza separated from her mother. However, the baby was rescued by her grandfather and taken as far away as possible, so that her granddaughter would have no further contact with the Nirwan family, the kayakers who own a famous bakery company. Burhan, the baby's grandfather entrusted his granddaughter to his confidant, whose wife was pregnant.

programme.desc: Dina really likes everything about Korea. This includes dreaming of a handsome prince or husband from Korea, or a Korean Oppa. programme.desc: A witty matchmaker plots to humble Hoshiyar Chand, a pompous millionaire, by making Raju, a simple coolie, pose as a rich man to woo his daughter-leading to comic chaos. Release Year: 1995

programme.title: Prime Witness
programme.desc: A retired judge fights to protect his daughter from a vengeful convict. After the judge is killed, a blind man takes on the dangerous task of safeguarding the girl.

programme.title: Company
programme.desc: Chandu and Mallik team up to form a gang that quickly earns a reputation. But as egos clash and trust fades, tension builds, leading to betrayal and the gang's downfall. Release Year: 2002 Director: Ram Gopal Varma

programme.title: Acharya

programme.desc: In a city plagued by a strange rise in fires, fireman Vithal and his policeman brother-in-law Samit reluctantly team up to solve the escalating crisis. Battling personal conflicts, they race against time to crack the case and save Mumbai. Release Year: 20

programme.title: Mard Ko Dard Nahi Hota
programme.desc: Surya has a lifelong condition that renders him unable to feel or register pain. Soon, he decides to learn martial arts and use his abilities to help his biggest idol. Release Year: 2018 Director: Vasan Bala

programme.title: Jaal: The Trap
programme.desc: To save his kidnapped girlfriend Neha from terrorists, Ajay is forced to abduct the home minister's daughter, Anita, only to uncover a shocking truth behind the plot. Release Year: 2003 Director: Guddu Dhanoa

programme.title: Alone
programme.desc: Two twin sisters who lived by one promise - 'We will always be together. We will never separate'. Later, the ghost of dead haunt the surviving sister. Release Year: 2015 Director: Bhushan Patel

programme.title: Money Back Guarantee
programme.desc: A simple man is tricked by a cunning self-proclaimed guru. With his life in chaos, he turns to his friends for help and together they try to escape the mess. Release Year: 2016 Director: Sunil Pal

programme.title: Parmanu - The Story Of Pokhran
programme.desc: A look at India's second confidential nuclear test series at Pokhran led by Dr. APJ Abdul Kalam, during the time of PM Atal Bihari Vajpayee's tenure. Release Year: 2018 Director: Abhishek Sharma

programme.title: Biquefarre
programme.desc: Forty years after ''Farrebique'', Georges Rouquier returns to visit his cousins, who are farmers in Aveyron. In the 1940s, he filmed their day-to-day lives. Since then, everything has changed: farming has become an industry, you have to expand and diversify to survive or die.

programme.title: Piscine Pro
programme.desc: With a degree in history and civilisation, Charles-Olivier is struggling to find a job in his field. He eventually takes a job as a clerk in a swimming pool shop. With his spirits low, he's getting by as best he can.

programme.title: Panier De Crabes
programme.desc: A city-dweller in his 30s, who is recovering from burnout, stops next to a wild lake. Whereas he thought that he had found solitude and tranquillity, the place turns out to be not as calm and isolated as it appeared.

programme.title: Objectif Monde - EP 2
programme.desc: 'Objectif Monde'' proposes special reports and investigations into societal or geopolitical issues, taking the time to analyse the situations thanks to different specialist opinions. This TV5MONDE programme is produced with French-speaking partners (RTBF, RTS, Radio-Canada, France Televisions) and the support of the public French-speaking media.

programme.title: Le Grand Jt Des Territoires
programme.desc: Up-to-date news from the French regions presented by Cyril Viguier.

programme.title: 64' - 2e Partie
programme.desc: International current affairs as seen by the French-speaking world.

programme.title: L'invite
programme.desc: Patrick Simonin hosts the stars in the headlines, culture, music, film, books, an unmissable rendezvous with all those who light up our times.

programme.title: Nature En Symbiose - EP 2
programme.desc: In the hostile environment of the mountains, flora and fauna have to demonstrate incredible ingenuity and develop powerful alliances to survive the combination of altitude and the extremely harsh weather conditions.

programme.title: Le Journal De La Rtbf
programme.desc: Complete international news roundup presented by the RTBF news staff.

programme.title: Savourer - EP 1
programme.desc: On the menu: antipasto salad, corn and ricotta dip, smoked salmon sandwich to share, blueberry sponge cake.

programme.title: Le Dessous Des Cartes - EP 7
programme.desc: International relations analysed using geography maps, which are vital to understanding the world in which we live and the challenges it presents.

programme.title: Le Journal Afrique
programme.desc: All the African news from the TV5MONDE news staff.

programme.title: Version Francaise - EP 24
programme.desc: Passionate about French chic, ambassadress Katherina Marx surrounds herself with major figures from the worlds of fashion, design, gastronomy, and fine living. Each episode features an iconic guest and a series of special reports, allowing viewers to discover or rediscover France, its young designers, and its chic and trendy hang-outs.

programme.title: Le Journal De La Rts
programme.desc: All the news from RTS.

programme.title: Le Journal De France 2
programme.desc: The television news programme of the France 2 editorial board (8 p.m. edition, Paris time).

programme.title: 64' - 2e Partie
programme.desc: International current affairs as seen by the French-speaking world.

programme.title: L'invite
programme.desc: Patrick Simonin hosts the stars in the headlines, culture, music, film, books, an unmissable rendezvous with all those who light up our times.

programme.title: La Grande Galerie Francophone
programme.desc: Every week and in public, Ali Baddou and his group of columnists receive French-speaking artists who are at the heart of current events and move the lines. Space for exchanges, creations and surprises, ''La grande galerie francophone'' celebrates art in all its diversity and shares it with everyone.

programme.title: Littoral - EP 16
programme.desc: The 'Grain de Sail' is a one-of-a-kind cargo sailboat. From Saint-Malo to New York, it transports 50 tons of wine, coffee and chocolate. Jacques and Olivier Barreau are behind this initiative and have chosen carbon-neutral maritime transport, all by the force of the wind.

programme.title: Un Si Grand Soleil - EP 1691
programme.desc: The Bastide, Estrela, Salama, Levy, Berville and Alami families, plus a host of supporting characters, live and work in the modern everyday city of Montpellier, in southern France. Between romance and crime thriller, with a blend of comic and serious themes, their stories weave a fascinating web.

programme.title: Interieurs - EP 3
programme.desc: Renowned names in design from regional furniture to apothecary bottles, Anne-Catherine Verwaerde tells us everything you need to know to find a bargain in a secondhand shop! Then we're off to Le Touquet where Gauthier and Victoire transform, recycle and reinvent empty glass bottles as genuine tableware.

programme.title: Nature En Symbiose - EP 2
programme.desc: In the hostile environment of the mountains, flora and fauna have to demonstrate incredible ingenuity and develop powerful alliances to survive the combination of altitude and the extremely harsh weather conditions.

programme.title: 6h Info
programme.desc: The 6am news bulletin (Paris time) by the France Televisions editorial team.

programme.title: Telematin
programme.desc: Information and good humour, 7 days a week! Resolutely in tune with the times, the first morning of France, strong of its editorial richness and its team dynamics, addresses many themes and deals with current events with seriousness and without dramatization.

programme.title: Telematin
programme.desc: The latest news and laughter, 7 days a week.

programme.title: Chef Pays - EP 94
programme.desc: Cooking is a way of building bridges between countries and sharing cultural diversity. Starting with a typical ingredient from the French overseas departments and territories, the chef creates a unique dish.

programme.title: Slam
programme.desc: Three contestants compete on arrow-word grids that they try to fill in by finding the answers to the given clues. But to access the clues, they must first answer questions with a very particular characteristic: the answer is always a letter.

programme.title: Le Telejournal De Radio-Canada
programme.desc: The televised news programme from the Radio-Canada team.

programme.title: Interieurs - EP 3
programme.desc: Renowned names in design from regional furniture to apothecary bottles, Anne-Catherine Verwaerde tells us everything you need to know to find a bargain in a secondhand shop! Then we're off to Le Touquet where Gauthier and Victoire transform, recycle and reinvent empty glass bottles as genuine tableware.

programme.title: Littoral - EP 16
programme.desc: The 'Grain de Sail' is a one-of-a-kind cargo sailboat. From Saint-Malo to New York, it transports 50 tons of wine, coffee and chocolate. Jacques and Olivier Barreau are behind this initiative and have chosen carbon-neutral maritime transport, all by the force of the wind.

programme.title: Rocky & Lily : C'est Dans La Boite ! - EP 2
programme.desc: Every day, Rocky and Lily receive a new box on the set. But what does it contain? It's always a surprising object that leads them to discover very different subjects: turtles, bowling or even cloud formation.

programme.title: Gigantosaurus - EP 6
programme.desc: Four little dinosaurs, Rocky, Bill, Tiny and Mazu, discover a dangerous world where the mysterious Gigantosaurus, the most ferocious of all the dinosaurs, is forever on the prowl. The four best friends set their heading for adventure, confronting their fears and working together to solve all their problems.

programme.title: Yetili - EP 19
programme.desc: Nina and Leon, two little mice, live in a bookshop whose mascot is a large yeti cuddly toy called Yetili. Each evening, once the bookshop has closed, Yetili comes to life and settles his two friends on his knees to read them a story.

programme.title: Dessine Les Animaux Avec Koumi - EP 36
programme.desc: Koumi is 6 years old, mischievous and always full of fun. The dream of her life is to know all the animals of the world, and she absolutely loves drawing! In each episode she explains how to draw animals really well.

programme.title: La Petite Pokou - EP 11
programme.desc: Kongouet Bian is questioned. Aza Yah and the real Kongouet Bian hide to watch what happens. Pokou finds herself in front of a little old lady: it's the priestess from Bali.

programme.title: La Petite Pokou - EP 12
programme.desc: The priestess from Bali teaches Pokou about the Komians and their role. Shortly afterwards, Pokou turns around and the ground gives way beneath her feet. She finds herself somewhere dark and strange.

programme.title: Tout Le Monde Veut Prendre Sa Place
programme.desc: The game where everyone wants to be a winner. One quiz, six candidates and, comfortably installed in his chair, one champion... whom everyone dreams of unseating!

programme.title: Itineraires Paysans - EP 9
programme.desc: The different attitudes and approaches of French farmers in terms of the environment, economy and landscape. A practical way of understanding a region and its terroir through their working practices.

programme.title: Un Si Grand Soleil - EP 1692
programme.desc: The Bastide, Estrela, Salama, Levy, Berville and Alami families, plus a host of supporting characters, live and work in the modern everyday city of Montpellier, in southern France. Between romance and crime thriller, with a blend of comic and serious themes, their stories weave a fascinating web.

programme.title: Au Bout De L'enquete, La Fin Du Crime Parfait ?
programme.desc: They are all cases that were closed, considered unsolvable, sometimes resisting police efforts for decades until a forgotten clue, an unhoped-for witness or a forensic innovation finally made it possible to unmask the culprit. Alongside Marie Drucker, the criminologist Alain Bauer explains the technical, psychological, sociological or historical elements involved.

programme.title: Le Journal International
programme.desc: All the national and international news from the TV5MONDE news staff.

programme.title: Meurtres A Chartres
programme.desc: While a wedding is taking place in Chartres Cathedral, one of the witnesses is found dead in the crypt. The investigation is entrusted to Captains Victoire and Pierre Templard. The husband and wife police team soon realise that the murder is linked to the legend of the mysterious pregnant Virgin.

programme.title: Foot! (1/2)
programme.desc: Match summaries, commentary and analyses, after each day of the Ligue 1 McDonald's, the French football championship.

programme.title: Foot! (2/2)
programme.desc: Match summaries, commentary and analyses, after each day of the Ligue 1 McDonald's, the French football championship.

programme.title: Le Monde D'hier
programme.desc: Three days before the first round of the presidential election, elizabeth de Raincy, President of the Republic, wants to retire from politics. But Franck L'Herbier, Secretary General of the elysee Palace, tells her that a foreign scandal from is likely to hand victory to the far-right candidate.

programme.title: Les Belles Cicatrices
programme.desc: Gaspard is still in love with Leila. One month after she left him, they meet again in a crowded bar. As the reunion goes badly, Gaspard hides under the table.

programme.title: Nous Les Griots
programme.desc: Malik, Daouda's eldest son, wants to marry Mariama. But when a meeting between the two families, both originally from Senegal, is organised over a meal, Daouda discovers that they are from two very different social classes. His family is ''griot''; Mariama's is noble.

programme.title: Fred L'handicape - EP 1
programme.desc: Fred ends up paralysed after breaking two vertebrae in an accident. How will his relationship with Myriam change following the tragedy and all its challenges?

programme.title: Fred L'handicape - EP 2
programme.desc: Life in hospital is starting to get him down. Fred relies heavily on friends and family, and his medical team. But when life is at its darkest, a new arrival in his life offers a glimmer of hope.

programme.title: Fred L'handicape - EP 3
programme.desc: Fred is perfectly aware that he'll have to live with his disability for the rest of his life. Will he have the courage to get back up on the improvisation stage?

programme.title: Fred L'handicape - EP 4
programme.desc: A ''making of'' takes us behind the scenes with the series' actors, author and director.

programme.title: Maghreb-Orient Express - EP 7
programme.desc: What's new in the Arab worlds? Journalist Mohamed Kaci hosts those making the cultural headlines in Tunis, Algiers, Rabat, Beirut, Alexandria, Dubai...

programme.title: 64' - 2e Partie
programme.desc: International current affairs as seen by the French-speaking world.

programme.title: L'invite
programme.desc: Patrick Simonin hosts the stars in the headlines, culture, music, film, books, an unmissable rendezvous with all those who light up our times.

programme.title: Au Bout De L'enquete, La Fin Du Crime Parfait ?
programme.desc: They are all cases that were closed, considered unsolvable, sometimes resisting police efforts for decades until a forgotten clue, an unhoped-for witness or a forensic innovation finally made it possible to unmask the culprit. Alongside Marie Drucker, the criminologist Alain Bauer explains the technical, psychological, sociological or historical elements involved.

programme.title: Le Journal De La Rtbf
programme.desc: Complete international news roundup presented by the RTBF news staff.

programme.title: Tendance XXI - EP 25
programme.desc: French creativity is booming in the fields of fashion, crafts, design, beauty and gastronomy. 'Tendance XXI' showcases a know-how that evolves in tune with the times, sometimes even anticipating them.

programme.title: Littoral - EP 16
programme.desc: The 'Grain de Sail' is a one-of-a-kind cargo sailboat. From Saint-Malo to New York, it transports 50 tons of wine, coffee and chocolate. Jacques and Olivier Barreau are behind this initiative and have chosen carbon-neutral maritime transport, all by the force of the wind.

programme.title: Le Journal Afrique
programme.desc: All the African news from the TV5MONDE news staff.

programme.title: L'actu
programme.desc: The televised news programme from TVMonaco.

programme.title: Le Journal De La Rts
programme.desc: All the news from RTS.

programme.title: Le Journal De France 2
programme.desc: The television news programme of the France 2 editorial board (8 p.m. edition, Paris time).

programme.title: 64' - 2e Partie
programme.desc: International current affairs as seen by the French-speaking world.

programme.title: L'invite
programme.desc: Patrick Simonin hosts the stars in the headlines, culture, music, film, books, an unmissable rendezvous with all those who light up our times.

programme.title: C Dans L'air
programme.desc: All the latest major events, presented, explained and analysed! Special guests and journalists in the studio analyse both the latest news but also other controversial issues to give us a better understanding of the social, political and cultural events occurring around us.

programme.title: Chroniques D'en Haut
programme.desc: A magazine programme devoted to the mountains. An opportunity to explore a rich and fascinating world and take a sumptuous journey through the heart of the most beautiful landscapes of the Auvergne-Rhone-Alpes region.

programme.title: Un Si Grand Soleil - EP 1692
programme.desc: The Bastide, Estrela, Salama, Levy, Berville and Alami families, plus a host of supporting characters, live and work in the modern everyday city of Montpellier, in southern France. Between romance and crime thriller, with a blend of comic and serious themes, their stories weave a fascinating web.

programme.title: Ding Dong : Montre-Moi Ta Maison ! - EP 10
programme.desc: Visit to an incredible loft on the top floor of a former factory renovated into flats. Then direction the Grisons to visit the house of a couple of art-lovers who regularly invite artists to repaint the walls of their home.

programme.title: Tendance XXI - EP 25
programme.desc: French creativity is booming in the fields of fashion, crafts, design, beauty and gastronomy. 'Tendance XXI' showcases a know-how that evolves in tune with the times, sometimes even anticipating them.

programme.title: 6h Info
programme.desc: The 6am news bulletin (Paris time) by the France Televisions editorial team.

programme.title: Telematin
programme.desc: Information and good humour, 7 days a week! Resolutely in tune with the times, the first morning of France, strong of its editorial richness and its team dynamics, addresses many themes and deals with current events with seriousness and without dramatization.

programme.title: Telematin
programme.desc: The latest news and laughter, 7 days a week.

programme.title: Slam
programme.desc: Three contestants compete on arrow-word grids that they try to fill in by finding the answers to the given clues. But to access the clues, they must first answer questions with a very particular characteristic: the answer is always a letter.

programme.title: Le Telejournal De Radio-Canada
programme.desc: The televised news programme from the Radio-Canada team.

programme.title: Ding Dong : Montre-Moi Ta Maison ! - EP 10
programme.desc: Visit to an incredible loft on the top floor of a former factory renovated into flats. Then direction the Grisons to visit the house of a couple of art-lovers who regularly invite artists to repaint the walls of their home.

programme.title: Chroniques D'en Haut
programme.desc: A magazine programme devoted to the mountains. An opportunity to explore a rich and fascinating world and take a sumptuous journey through the heart of the most beautiful landscapes of the Auvergne-Rhone-Alpes region.

programme.title: Rocky & Lily : C'est Dans La Boite ! - EP 3
programme.desc: Every day, Rocky and Lily receive a new box on the set. But what does it contain? It's always a surprising object that leads them to discover very different subjects: turtles, bowling or even cloud formation.

programme.title: Gigantosaurus - EP 7
programme.desc: Four little dinosaurs, Rocky, Bill, Tiny and Mazu, discover a dangerous world where the mysterious Gigantosaurus, the most ferocious of all the dinosaurs, is forever on the prowl. The four best friends set their heading for adventure, confronting their fears and working together to solve all their problems.

programme.title: Yetili - EP 20
programme.desc: Nina and Leon, two little mice, live in a bookshop whose mascot is a large yeti cuddly toy called Yetili. Each evening, once the bookshop has closed, Yetili comes to life and settles his two friends on his knees to read them a story.

programme.title: Dessine Les Animaux Avec Koumi - EP 37
programme.desc: Koumi is 6 years old, mischievous and always full of fun. The dream of her life is to know all the animals of the world, and she absolutely loves drawing! In each episode she explains how to draw animals really well.

programme.title: La Petite Pokou - EP 13
programme.desc: Kongouet Bian is happy that Aza Yah is dead. Pokou joins her friends and they all play hide-and-seek. When she returns to the priestess from Bali, she discovers that she has passed her first test.

programme.title: La Petite Pokou - EP 14
programme.desc: Pokou starts her second challenge. N'zi and Lucio advance towards a group of small huts. A little girl comes out of one of the huts and jumps into Lucio's arms.

programme.title: Tout Le Monde Veut Prendre Sa Place
programme.desc: The game where everyone wants to be a winner. One quiz, six candidates and, comfortably installed in his chair, one champion... whom everyone dreams of unseating!

programme.title: Itineraires Paysans - EP 10
programme.desc: The different attitudes and approaches of French farmers in terms of the environment, economy and landscape. A practical way of understanding a region and its terroir through their working practices.

programme.title: Un Si Grand Soleil - EP 1693
programme.desc: The Bastide, Estrela, Salama, Levy, Berville and Alami families, plus a host of supporting characters, live and work in the modern everyday city of Montpellier, in southern France. Between romance and crime thriller, with a blend of comic and serious themes, their stories weave a fascinating web.

programme.title: Le Point
programme.desc: Magazine programme which explores issues relating to society, science and the environment, involving investigations and in-depth analysis, from a resolutely Canadian perspective.

programme.title: Le Journal International
programme.desc: All the national and international news from the TV5MONDE news staff.

programme.title: Sans Frapper
programme.desc: A kaleidoscopic look at the issue of rape, presenting the true story by a victim, Ada, through several voices.

programme.title: Au-Dela Des Murs
programme.desc: One morning, Lina is getting ready to go to Baumettes prison to attend her first visit. Nadjim, her boyfriend, has recently been imprisoned. Before leaving, she gathers things to take to him.

programme.title: A La Poussiere
programme.desc: For the last few months, Fazia has begun her days as a cleaner at the Martin-Pelissards', who are reluctant for her work to be legally declared. Then, one morning, an incident turns into a race against time and a desperate attempt to keep her job.

programme.title: Lebowitz Contre Lebowitz - EP 5
programme.desc: Warnier finds it impossible to go into prison to give his lessons; Paule decides to accompany him, whether he likes it or not. Inside she meets Julien Ocelot and immediately agrees to handle his defence. Irene gets over her depression and regains custody of her son, Paule is devastated.

programme.title: Lebowitz Contre Lebowitz - EP 6
programme.desc: Paule, full of sympathy for Julien for the suffering he's been through, allows her feelings to get the better of her. She falls in love with him. Irene tries to make Paule see reason by pointing out that she's suffering from losing custody of Simon.

programme.title: THE BIG INTERVIEW - EP 15
programme.desc: From San Sebastian to London and with over 180 games together over the past seven years, Mikel Merino and Martin Zubimendi know each other very well. Having played alongside one another for Real Sociedad, the Spanish national team and now Arsenal, the pair are key figures in the Gunners' fast start to the season.

programme.title: PL STORIES - EP 25
programme.desc: Ahead of the first North London derby of the season, we sit down with the man who made one of most controversial transfers in World football; Sol Campbell. He opens up about his decision to leave Tottenham for their fiercest rivals, Arsenal, the intense pressure of returning to White Hart Lane that first season, and how he's dealt with the fallout ever since. A fascinating insight into the 'move that shook North London'.

programme.title: PL MOMENTS - EP 2
programme.desc: Premier League Moments sits down with one of the most dominant centre-backs the league has ever seen. Sol Campbell rose through the ranks at Tottenham Hotspur before making one of the most controversial moves in Premier League history, when he crossed the divide to join rivals Arsenal. Under Arsene Wenger, Campbell became a cornerstone of the defence, winning two league titles and playing a vital role in the Invincibles season.

A fascinating insight into the 'move that shook North London'.

programme.title: FIGHT SPORTS MMA Garreth McLellan vs. Brendan Lesar
programme.desc: This episode features coverage of the interim Middleweight Championship as Garreth 'SoldierBoy' McLellan and Brendan 'Descendant' Lesar meet in the hexagon. Bonus coverage includes Matunga Djikasa vs. Ivan Strydom and Devon Cronje vs. Guy Mongambi.

programme.title: WCCB David Benavidez vs. Demetrius Andrade
programme.desc: From the Michelob Ultra Arena in Las Vegas, two undefeated Super Middleweights square off when David Benavidez meets Demetrius Andrade for the WBC Interim World Championship. Benavidez is 27-0, with a list of impressive victories including a recent win over Caleb Plant to establish himself as one of the top rated fighters in the division. Andrade, the former Middleweight World Champion, is also without a loss at 32-0, and now looks to add a championship at Super Middleweight.

programme.title: Karate 1 Premier League
programme.desc: Dublin, Ireland welcomes one of the most anticipated events in Martial Arts this year as the Karate 1 Premier League returns. This will be the first Karate 1 Premier League event to take place in Dublin, with many of the top competitors in the world making the journey to Ireland for the first time and where the new Grand Winners will be crowned.

programme.title: Wide World of Fights Saul (Canelo) Alvarez vs. Alfonso Gomez
programme.desc: This episode features Saul (Canelo) Alvarez defending his WBC Light Middleweight title against contender Alfonso Gomez, as well as kickboxing, sumo, arm wrestling and more!

programme.title: KNOCKOUTS! Floyd Mayweather, Jr. vs. Miguel Cotto
programme.desc: The main event in this episode is Floyd Mayweather, Jr. challenging Miguel Cotto for his WBA super welterweight title in a bout which drew 1.5 million buys. Also on the card, action from former WBC Welterweight champ Victor Ortiz.

programme.title: FS Grand Sumo
programme.desc: For the first time the top ranked sumo competitors in the world are featured in an action packed series, FIGHT SPORTS GRAND SUMO. This new format presents Sumo in an authentic, in-depth and entertaining way covering the rules, ranks, match-ups, and more. Show 3 featuring Aoiyama, Ishiura, Ikioi and Chiyonokuni from the Haru basho, 2018.

programme.title: American Ninja Warrior
programme.desc: The second group of competitors race each other and the clock to complete Stage 1. In addition to old nemeses like the Giant Ring and Jumping Spider, contestants will face new obstacles: Piston Road and the Silk Slider.

programme.title: MEGA Fights In 60 Jermain Taylor vs. Jeff Lacy
programme.desc: MEGA Fights are premiere events from the sport of boxing including HBO World Championship Boxing and historic PPV events plus past, current and future World Champions. This episode features former Middleweight Champion Jermain 'Bad Intentions' Taylor (27-2, 17 KOs) in a back and forth battle with Jeff "Left Hook' Lacy (24-1, 17 KOs) in a WBC Super Middleweight Title Eliminator on November 15, 2008 from the Vanderbilt University Memorial Gymnasium in Nashville, Tennessee, USA.

programme.title: Greatest Classics Shane Mosley vs. Manuel Gomez
programme.desc: In this episode, the newly crowned IBF Lightweight World Champion, Shane Mosley, makes the first defense of the title he claimed from Phillip Holiday just three months earlier. He would face a tough competitor in Manuel Gomez of Laredo, Mexico, who would give the new champion a difficult test.

programme.title: KNOCKOUTS! Bernard Hopkins vs. Chad Dawson
programme.desc: The main event in this episode is Bernard Hopkins facing off with Chad Dawson in a light heavyweight championship rematch from their controversial October 2011 bout. Also on the card, action from former welterweight champ James Kirkland.

programme.title: FS Grand Sumo
programme.desc: For the first time the top ranked sumo competitors in the world are featured in an action packed series, FIGHT SPORTS GRAND SUMO. This new format presents Sumo in an authentic, in-depth and entertaining way covering the rules, ranks, match-ups, and more. Show 4 featuring Kakuryu, Shodai, Tochinoshin and Ichinojo from the Haru basho, 2018.

programme.title: XMA
programme.desc: In this episode we focus on the martial art of breaking and how the techniques are fine-tuned with technology.

programme.title: Prison Fighters
programme.desc: This series follows former Muay Thai champion Noy Khaopan and American Cody Moberly, two inmates in a Thailand prison, who after seven years are given the chance to fight for their release. By joining a controversial government modern day Prison Fight program, murderers and felons are given the chance to fight for their freedom, and possible redemption, through the ancient tradition of Muay Thai matches. Episode 1 of 4.

programme.title: FS MMA Chael Sonnen vs. Amar Suloev / Logan Boucher vs. Victor Daychief
programme.desc: BodogFIGHT features classic MMA matches involving some of your favorite fighters! This episode includes Chael Sonnen vs. Amar Suloev and Logan Boucher squaring off with Victor Daychief in British Columbia, Canada.

This episode features former Middleweight Champion Jermain 'Bad Intentions' Taylor (27-2, 17 KOs) in a back and forth battle with Jeff "Left Hook' Lacy (24-1, 17 KOs) in a WBC Super Middleweight Title Eliminator on November 15, 2008 from the Vanderbilt University Memorial Gymnasium in Nashville, Tennessee, USA.

programme.title: Greatest Classics Shane Mosley vs. Manuel Gomez
programme.desc: In this episode, the newly crowned IBF Lightweight World Champion, Shane Mosley, makes the first defense of the title he claimed from Phillip Holiday just three months earlier. He would face a tough competitor in Manuel Gomez of Laredo, Mexico, who would give the new champion a difficult test.

programme.title: KNOCKOUTS! Bernard Hopkins vs. Chad Dawson
programme.desc: The main event in this episode is Bernard Hopkins facing off with Chad Dawson in a light heavyweight championship rematch from their controversial October 2011 bout. Also on the card, action from former welterweight champ James Kirkland.

programme.title: FS Grand Sumo
programme.desc: For the first time the top ranked sumo competitors in the world are featured in an action packed series, FIGHT SPORTS GRAND SUMO. This new format presents Sumo in an authentic, in-depth and entertaining way covering the rules, ranks, match-ups, and more. Show 4 featuring Kakuryu, Shodai, Tochinoshin and Ichinojo from the Haru basho, 2018.

programme.title: XMA
programme.desc: In this episode we focus on the martial art of breaking and how the techniques are fine-tuned with technology.

programme.title: Prison Fighters
programme.desc: This series follows former Muay Thai champion Noy Khaopan and American Cody Moberly, two inmates in a Thailand prison, who after seven years are given the chance to fight for their release. By joining a controversial government modern day Prison Fight program, murderers and felons are given the chance to fight for their freedom, and possible redemption, through the ancient tradition of Muay Thai matches. Episode 1 of 4.

programme.title: MEGA Fights Sergio Gabriel Martinez vs. Serhiy Dzinziruk
programme.desc: This episode features a bout for the vacant WBC diamond middleweight title, as Sergio Gabriel 'Maravilla' Martinez (46-2, 25 KOs) takes on fellow southpaw Serhiy Dzinziruk, aka 'Dzyna Razor' (37-0. 24 KOs). This fight took place from Foxwoods Resort Casino in Mashantucket, Connecticut, USA, on March 12, 2011. Martinez was the reigning Fighter of the Year coming into the fight and vacated his WBC Middleweight title in order to fight the undefeated former champion Dzinziruk.

programme.title: KNOCKOUTS! Shane Mosley vs. Sergio Mora
programme.desc: The main event in this episode is "Sugar" Shane Mosley facing off with Sergio Mora with a highly disputed and controversial decision you will have to see to believe! The two never had a rematch. Also on the card, action from WBC Super Welterweight champ Jermell Charlo.

programme.desc: Family is Theresa's cornerstone, which is why connecting people to their loved ones is her life's mission. In a reading she's never shared before, Theresa delivers healing messages to her son's friend.

programme.title: Married At First Sight Australia (S9) - EP 32
programme.desc: Golden couple Olivia and Jackson are on the rocks, while boys' and girls' night descends into mayhem with fighting galore!

programme.title: The Plot To Kill My Mother
programme.desc: A young woman who unknowingly grew up in federal witness protection reels after her mother's murder, leading her to question everything. She decides to leave the program and find the killer.

programme.title: The Venice Murders
programme.desc: Leaving her career behind, Celia follows her passion to Italy but faces crisis when her roommate vanishes. Alone, she joins eccentric Aunt Rosato to rescue her friend and unmask the abductor.

programme.title: MasterChef Australia (S16) - EP 21
programme.desc: Mikiko Terasaki of Sydney's Omu restaurant shows off her technique in making omurice. Inspired by the visit from viral sensation Mikiko, contestants will have 75 minutes to create a dish featuring eggs.

programme.title: Got To Leave Something - EP 3
programme.desc: The two adventurers follow the mountaineer deep into the remote areas of Jiri Mountain. They experience a feast with makgeolli (Korean rice wine) and local mountain folk.

programme.title: Ppang Car Road 2 - EP 10

programme.title: Deliciously Twisted Classics - EP 6

programme.title: Jason's Table: Masterful Dishes - EP 6
programme.desc: Five Willow Fish is a Taiwanese dish that makes great use of the nation's affluent fishery. Chef Long interprets this dish with masterful skills, and Jason creates a dish inspired by Five Willow Fish.

programme.title: Zombie House Flipping (S5) - EP 73

programme.title: Rachael Ray's Meals In Minutes (S3) - EP 64

programme.title: Inside Africa
programme.desc: As part of?Inside Africa's?25th anniversary, we have a sit-down between two of the continent's most celebrated voices: Angelique Kidjo?and Lupita Nyong'o. The setting is The Met's newly reimagined?Arts of Africa?gallery, a powerful space in which to reflect on African creativity, identity, and legacy. Five-time Grammy award winning Kidjo and Oscar-winning actor Nyong'o reflect on their careers and the rise and influence of African culture across the world.

programme.title: African Voices Playmakers
programme.desc: Larry Madowo meets two trailblazing women redefining strength and resilience. Somali-born boxer Ramla Ali rose from refugee to Olympic athlete and advocate, using her platform to empower women worldwide. In Lagos, Nigerian police officer Juliet Ukah breaks barriers as the first African woman signed to the Professional Fighters League, proving that true warriors fight for more than victory.

programme.title: Historical Drama "UNBOUND" Eps. 45 (R)
programme.desc: Summoned by Sadanobu and Takaoka (Tominaga Ai), Tsutaju is asked to assist in a revenge against a feudal lord known for his obsession with puppets. He is ordered to stir public excitement by spreading the notion that Gennai may still be alive. When Tsutaju visits the theater district, he hears that this yearâ€™s Soga Festival will feature actors performing a mass dance in the streets. Inspired, he comes up with the idea of releasing an actor portrait rumored to be the work of Gennai.

programme.desc: The 113th Drama Serial, inspired by the lives of Koizumi Setsu and Lafcadio Hearn also known as Koizumi Yakumo, portrays those who were left behind in the rapidly Westernizing Meiji era. At its heart is a woman captivated by ghost stories and her foreign-born husband. Together, they share a life that seems ordinary yet delightfully odd.

programme.title: The Battle After Honno-ji Incident (R)
programme.desc: After Oda Nobunagaâ€™s death, a fierce struggle for supremacy erupts! From the Honno-ji Incident to the Battle of Yamazaki, twelve dramatic days come alive as Mitsuhide and Hideyoshi face off. What bold strategy did Mitsuhide devise? Newly uncovered facts reveal the truth behind Honno-ji. This program delivers a full-scale drama, brought to life with cutting-edge virtual technology, offering an immersive experience of the decisive turning point that shaped the Sengoku period.

programme.desc: Project X returns for the first time in 18 years. The former series featured people involved in project related to the Japanese industry and contemporary history. The new series focuses on people in the "Lost Era" following the collapse of the bubble economy. In every era, there are always those take on challenges. Even without receiving praise or being in the spotlight, some dedicate themselves to their work. The documentary delivers passion and courage right to you.

programme.title: Drama 10 "Shiba Inu's Rule" Eps. 7 (R)
programme.desc: An egoistic magazine editor in his forties finds himself completely alone at work-abandoned by colleagues, with only his Shiba Inu by his side. Inspired by the dog, he proposes a Shiba-themed magazine. Misfits are forced to collaborate, sparking friction and chaos. But through the dogâ€™s gentle gaze, ideas emerge, and broken hearts begin to heal.

Agroforestry and the international forest restoration funding mechanism TFFF are emerging as key solutions.

His mother creates an artificial intelligence robot in his likeness that must pretend to be a real human and fool people into believing that he's real until the real son wakes up. He is placed in the midst of a fierce power struggle of a business mogul family in the young man's stead. There's a woman who protects him as a bodyguard but doesn't even know if he's a human or a robot!

programme.title: The Merchant : Gaekju 2015 - EP 21
programme.desc: Cheon Bongsam, who begins his life as a market tout, becomes the most powerful merchant of Joseon after going through experiences as a head of a private merchant army and a chief master merchant.

programme.title: KBS WORLD News Today
programme.desc: Bringing you KBS World daily English news, anchored by Choi Kyu-yeon.

programme.title: DOCU INSIGHT
programme.desc: A premium documentary series from Korea's public broadcaster KBS

programme.title: The Seasons - EP 9
programme.desc: When the end of one week meets the start of another week, this show will bring you music and stories that soothe your worries and concerns.

programme.title: Hello Monster - EP 16
programme.desc: I find my true self through you. A man and a woman meet again at a crime scene - like sworn enemies. They get to work together to solve the crime concealing their true intentions. Then, they fall in love with each other and starts to find their identities.

programme.title: Marie and Her Three Daddies - EP 27
programme.desc: Marie's turbulent journey to find her father leads to the birth of an eccentric new family, one that proves stronger than blood and more persistent than DNA.

programme.title: A Graceful Liar - EP 37
programme.desc: A bold yet heartbreaking story of a mother and daughter-in-law who meet through marriage and wage a war of lies to seize the Geonhyang family, struggling for a dramatic reversal of fortune.

programme.title: Knot To Treasure - EP 2

programme.title: Shadow Of Justice - EP 13
programme.desc: Because of some transfer arrangement and several complicated cases, AICIP Au Yeung Chung (Bobby Au Yeung) and CUSP Tsui Hay-yi (Joey Meng) become collaborating partners. Au Yeung Chung had promised the late Mrs. Sheung he would be tolerant of Sheung Siu.

programme.title: Just Love - EP 15
programme.desc: Judge KO HEI MAN (HSUAN JESSICA HESTER) and KOT KWOK KWONG (CHAN KAM HUNG, SUNNY) have agreed that MAN will concentrate on her career while KWONG will be taking care of the housework after they get married. Everything is in harmony until KWONGâ€™s father discovers MAN and KWONGâ€™s pre-marriage written agreement. Their relationship complicates ever since._x000D__x000D_ To make things worse, KWONG breaks the agreement and demands to have his own career.

programme.title: Get On A Flat - EP 11
programme.desc: Rewind to the 2008 financial crisis and supermarket manager Che Chi-ming (Andrew Lam) hurriedly sells his apartment. Who could have known even though Chi-ming has been chasing after property prices for 14 years, he still cannot get on the property ladder once again. A middle class lifestyle is tragically transformed into a "midlife crisis"._x000D__x000D_Chi-mingâ€™s wife Man Wai (Elena Kong) is obsessed with property ownership. She goes to work as a part-time maid at some luxury home.

programme.title: Fist Within Four Walls, A - EP 20
programme.desc: CHOR AU-KUEN (Ruco Chan) bears the grief of the loss of his family and returns to the walled city in hopes of finding his long lost sister, only to find out that the place he grew up in has become a lawless no man's land. Concealing his real identity as a Bajiquan master, he creates a new identity and gets acquainted with a feisty hair salon lady boss, TIU LAN (Nancy Wu), a dentist, DUEN YING-FUNG (Benjamin Yuen), and a worker, BUT TAK-LIU (Lam Tsz Sin).

programme.title: Silver Spoon, Sterling Shackles - EP 30
programme.desc: During the 1930s in Hong Kong, where east meets west, feminist activists started campaigning for women's rights, seeking to uproot the phenomenon of men's superiority over women. Though having studied abroad in England and leading a western lifestyle, CHUNG CHEUK-MAN (Damian Lau) , a well-known Chinese barrister, is very traditional indeed.

Everything is in harmony until KWONGâ€™s father discovers MAN and KWONGâ€™s pre-marriage written agreement. Their relationship complicates ever since._x000D__x000D_ To make things worse, KWONG breaks the agreement and demands to have his own career.

programme.title: Get On A Flat - EP 11
programme.desc: Rewind to the 2008 financial crisis and supermarket manager Che Chi-ming (Andrew Lam) hurriedly sells his apartment. Who could have known even though Chi-ming has been chasing after property prices for 14 years, he still cannot get on the property ladder once again. A middle class lifestyle is tragically transformed into a "midlife crisis"._x000D__x000D_Chi-mingâ€™s wife Man Wai (Elena Kong) is obsessed with property ownership. She goes to work as a part-time maid at some luxury home.

programme.title: Fist Within Four Walls, A - EP 20
programme.desc: CHOR AU-KUEN (Ruco Chan) bears the grief of the loss of his family and returns to the walled city in hopes of finding his long lost sister, only to find out that the place he grew up in has become a lawless no man's land. Concealing his real identity as a Bajiquan master, he creates a new identity and gets acquainted with a feisty hair salon lady boss, TIU LAN (Nancy Wu), a dentist, DUEN YING-FUNG (Benjamin Yuen), and a worker, BUT TAK-LIU (Lam Tsz Sin).

programme.title: Silver Spoon, Sterling Shackles - EP 30
programme.desc: During the 1930s in Hong Kong, where east meets west, feminist activists started campaigning for women's rights, seeking to uproot the phenomenon of men's superiority over women. Though having studied abroad in England and leading a western lifestyle, CHUNG CHEUK-MAN (Damian Lau) , a well-known Chinese barrister, is very traditional indeed.

programme.title: Silver Spoon, Sterling Shackles - EP 31
programme.desc: During the 1930s in Hong Kong, where east meets west, feminist activists started campaigning for women's rights, seeking to uproot the phenomenon of men's superiority over women. Though having studied abroad in England and leading a western lifestyle, CHUNG CHEUK-MAN (Damian Lau) , a well-known Chinese barrister, is very traditional indeed.

programme.title: Gods Of Honour - EP 6
programme.desc: NAR JAR (CHAN HO MAN, BENNY) was a â€˜Fire masterâ€™ in his previous life. He was killed by LEE CHING (YUEN WAH). After reincarnation, he ironically becomes CHINGâ€™s third son. He is very much affected by his old memories and cannot forgive his father. CHING also keeps his distance from him because of his exotic nature and eventually sends him away with excuses. Luckily, he is saved by some kind people and becomes a General when he is still a teenager.

programme.title: Silver Spoon, Sterling Shackles - EP 32
programme.desc: During the 1930s in Hong Kong, where east meets west, feminist activists started campaigning for women's rights, seeking to uproot the phenomenon of men's superiority over women. Though having studied abroad in England and leading a western lifestyle, CHUNG CHEUK-MAN (Damian Lau) , a well-known Chinese barrister, is very traditional indeed.

programme.title: Silver Spoon, Sterling Shackles - EP 33
programme.desc: During the 1930s in Hong Kong, where east meets west, feminist activists started campaigning for women's rights, seeking to uproot the phenomenon of men's superiority over women. Though having studied abroad in England and leading a western lifestyle, CHUNG CHEUK-MAN (Damian Lau) , a well-known Chinese barrister, is very traditional indeed.

programme.title: It's a Wonderful Life
programme.desc: Hong Kong tycoon Ren Da Kuan takes care of his family that spans four generations, yet his three sons grapple with their own challenges. Everything changes when his daughter returns from studying in France with her friend Roberto. Roberto brings a wave of transformation to the Ren family, sparking new hope and opportunities for all.

programme.title: Mr. Possessed
programme.desc: Riley is cursed by an evil spirit to not be able to approach any woman. When he falls in love with Siu Yu, Riley's mother decides to use her to help him vanquish the evil spirit. On their wedding night, Riley passes out after protecting Siu Yu from the attack of the evil spirit. Can the two finally break the curse?

programme.title: Initial D
programme.desc: The movie is adapted from a famous Japanese manga. 18-year-old Takumi delivers tofu in his father's near-obsolete car every day and becomes a good racer with perfect drifting skill. Encouraged by his father, he joins a mountain race and unexpectedly wins it, making him famous overnight and leading him from one exciting race to another.

programme.title: Everlasting Regret
programme.desc: Adapted from an award-winning Chinese novel, the story follows the life of a legendary Shanghai beauty Wang Qi Yao from her glamorous to her simpler days. She stays true to her own way of life while surviving the constant betrayal of her men, and bears witness to the waves of change to her city from 1947 to 1981.

programme.title: Wo Hu
programme.desc: The Hong Kong Police has placed more than a thousand undercover officers in various triad groups to bring down the largest criminal organization in Hong Kong. Betrayal, deceit and murder bring this group of "brothers" into a collision with the law and with each other!

programme.title: Long Arm of the Law Part 3
programme.desc: Chinese ex-soldier Li is wrongly accused and seeks refuge in Hong Kong to escape a death sentence. En route, he meets Sam and Moon. While Li has fallen in love with Moon, Hong Kong triad kidnaps Moon and coerces Li into aiding a robbery. Meanwhile, the mainland police officer tracks Li's path to Hong Kong, intensifying the chase.

programme.title: Two Thumbs Up
programme.desc: After 16 years of imprisonment, a gangster gathers his old crew for one last heist by converting a minibus to a police van and going after a hearse transporting a huge amount of black money. However, not only does a police officer figure out the gang's scheme, another group of ruthless thieves are also after the same hearse...

programme.title: My Darling Genie
programme.desc: A genie who is trapped in a Chinese oil umbrella helps an honorable young man and his uncle to deal with a covetous loan shark.

programme.title: Model from Hell
programme.desc: Anna, an exceptional student in a modelling school, becomes the target of envy from fellow models, who all die mysteriously when they want to harm her. It turns out that when Anna is upset, she undergoes a terrifying transformation and can wield lethal psychic power...

programme.title: Those Were the Days
programme.desc: Director Wong despises Cantonese movies of the 60s, but accidentally travels back in time to that movie set. He meets Director Chu, who tells him he can return to modern time if someone likes the film he makes. Wong meets four classic movie stars and invites them to star in his new film, but it flops unexpectedly. Can Wong return to the present?

programme.title: Beauty And The 7 Beasts
programme.desc: Teddy, once a renowned movie star, is facing a career decline. To make a living, he accepts five disciples to shape them into stars. Teddy's career regains momentum after he reunites with his long-lost daughter, but he is also confronted by a rival at the same time. His daughter and disciples decide to help him overcome this difficult situation...

programme.title: Royal Tramp II
programme.desc: The leader of Dragon clan, Long Er, helps General Wu to overthrow Emperor Kang Xi. However, Long Er is betrayed by General Wu and is rescued by Xiao Bao. As a result, she bestows her virginity and martial arts power to Xiao Bao to fight against Wu. At the same time, Xiao Bao fortuitously unveils the hidden treasures from "The Sutra of 42 Chapters".

programme.title: July Rhapsody
programme.desc: A 40-year-old high school teacher is in midlife crisis. His marriage is on the rocks and he is involved in a taboo romance with a female student who has a crush on him. Meanwhile, his wife is off to care for her dying ex-lover who shares a complicated history with the couple...

programme.title: The Bride With White Hair II
programme.desc: After being betrayed by Zhuo, the white-haired witch Lian seeks revenge by slaughtering her way through the eight martial arts clans. However, she is soon attacked by a man whose bride she has abducted. Meanwhile, Zhuo, who is waiting on a hilltop for a flower to bloom for Lian's restoration, hastens to save her upon realizing the danger she is in.

programme.title: Don't Open Your Eyes
programme.desc: A cop has the ability to see ghosts, which is something that has been passed down from generation to generation in his family. He must learn how to manage this gift when he is confronted by the ghost of a notorious criminal whom he has shot.

programme.title: Behind the Yellow Line
programme.desc: A fresh graduate, Paul, strikes up an acquaintance with a pretty young girl, Monica, on the metro. Monica is involved in a love affair with a married man while Paul is also pursued by a rich girl. When Paul vows his true love for Monica, she suggests playing hide-and-seek with him in the metro to decide if they are fated to be together.

programme.title: The Story Of My Son
programme.desc: Li attempts to make a fortune at the horse-racing tracks, but is subsequently entangled with loan sharks. Li becomes debt-laden while his sons are harassed by debt collectors, when more heart-wrenching events begin to unfold.

programme.title: Winner Takes All
programme.desc: Two private detectives want to gain fame by solving a series of robberies. However, they were fooled by the King of Thieves during the investigation. It was later discovered that all the robberies were related to a Japanese businessman, Miyamoto. Who is the real King of Thieves?

programme.title: Casino Tycoon
programme.desc: Inspired by the story of Macau's Casino King Stanley Ho, the movie traces his blood-splattered fight to the top from 1930s to 1960s. In 1941, a young graduate, Benny Ho, flees Hong Kong during the Japanese invasion and heads for Macau. Benny starts as a labourer but rises to the top of the city's casino business with his courage, wisdom and diligence.

programme.title: Wise Guys Never Die
programme.desc: Nick meets Teddy, a con artiste, when he is sent to prison for embezzlement, and Teddy teaches him all the gambling tricks. After their release, they team up with Teddy's lover Lora, to take revenge on Dragon, who framed Teddy for his sentence. Nick though is seduced by Lora and they end up in an affair. Will Nick finally join Teddy in his revenge?

programme.title: Women
programme.desc: Bo Yi's husband is having an affair, so Bo Yi divorces him and joins the "Happy Spinsters Club" set up by her friends. However, she soon finds out that she does not enjoy being single and while sorting out her thoughts, her repentant husband begs her forgiveness. She must now decide on what she truly wants.

programme.title: Romantic Dream
programme.desc: Dino meets his dream girl Mandy and falls in love with her at first sight. However, she disappears suddenly and he only sees her again after nine years, when she is already married. To overcome the pain of losing his love, Dino finds a guru with supernatural power to make him meet Mandy in his dream.

programme.title: Cherie
programme.desc: Cherie Chung plays the title character in this sexy romance as a fitness instructor who attracts the attentions of a wealthy businessman and a handsome photographer.

programme.title: 97 Aces Go Places
programme.desc: Hao Shi becomes the new triad boss after his father is killed by the pretty swindler, Ling. While professional gunman Drunken Gun is tasked to help Hao Shi take revenge, Ling is hunted by gangster Lei, from whom she has conned 2 million dollars. In the process, Hao Shi and Drunken Gun accidentally arrest Lei instead...

programme.title: Face to Face
programme.desc: Tamotsu dies in a skiing accident and his roommate Yoshio marries his wife as well as inherits his entire fortune. At Tamotsu's funeral, Yoshio sees a badly disfigured old man and that is only the beginning of an evil downfall for him...

programme.title: Let's Make Laugh
programme.desc: When a young housewife's debt-ridden, philandering husband leaves her with a mountain of tax debts, a security guard is hired by the tax authority to guard the assets, but he starts falling for her instead.

programme.title: The Eye 10
programme.desc: This third installment of 'The Eye' horror movie series is about the creepy adventures of a group of teenagers who summon spirits by using the ten methods outlined in a mysterious comic book while vacationing in Thailand.

programme.title: Ninth Happiness
programme.desc: A comedy starring many popular movie stars, this is a story about a magistrate and his brothers aiming to introduce sin and romance into the virtuous community of Rainbow Village. As they vie for the affections of a charming young village maiden, conflicts arise, adding a twist to their mischievous endeavours.

programme.title: Girl with the Diamond Slipper
programme.desc: An aspiring TV actress gets into hot water when a stolen diamond is hidden in the shoes she bought for a party.

programme.title: All's Well End's Well 97
programme.desc: Mr Lo has three sons, Leung, Fay and Kung; and a daughter-in-law, Eliza. While they seem like a normal family, their relationships need mending. Leung and Fay play a prank on their brother Kung on his birthday by falsely claiming that he has won the lottery. This sets off a chain reaction of funny mishaps that finally brings the family together.

programme.title: Moods Of Love
programme.desc: This Song Dynasty period piece about how far one would go for love (or lust) has two tales. The first involves a devilish magistrate who tries to tempt a Buddhist monk out of his self-professed celibacy by hiring a pretty prostitute. The second is the tragic tale of an exploited young girl who is forced to work in an unscrupulous couple's brothel.

programme.title: Duel Of Fist
programme.desc: Fan Ke discovers at his father's deathbed that he has a half-brother, Wenlie, in Thailand. He goes to find Wenlie, who became a boxer to support his sick mother. Following their encounter, the two got involved in the underworld of boxing match gambling.

programme.title: Fangs Of The Cobra
programme.desc: Incredibly, the title serpent is not a harbinger of horror, but actually the film's hero. This virtuous viper sniffs out bombs, fights gangs, battles a baby-killing rodent and even takes on a duplicitous woman. This one-of-a-kind thriller will be applauded by reptile fans everywhere.

programme.title: Vengeance
programme.desc: Yu Lou is betrayed by his wife and eventually killed by her lover, Fung, who is the boss of a martial arts school. Yu Lou's brother, Xiao Lou, knows about his tragic death and is determined to take revenge for him.

programme.title: Fast Fingers
programme.desc: After his release from prison, Uncle Bill returns to make a fortune with his past thieving partners. They continue to prey on the unsuspecting public, but are closely watched by the upright police chief, who happens to be the boyfriend of one of Uncle Bill's nieces!

programme.title: The Butterfly Chalice
programme.desc: In the Ming Dynasty, scholar Tian Yu Chuan defends a fisherman's honour but accidentally kills the governor's son, driving him into exile. Pursued to the river's edge, he is rescued by the fisherman's daughter. Amid danger, love blossoms between them, and Tian seals their bond with his family heirloom, the Butterfly Chalice.

programme.title: Danger Has Two Faces
programme.desc: Many years ago, Inspector Kam killed an innocent man and decided to resign from the police force. He became a professional killer who disguises as a pet store owner. When his best friend, Bobby begins investigating recent murder cases committed by Kam, he discovers that the mastermind behind these cases is actually his superintendent.

programme.title: The Mad Monk
programme.desc: The movie consists of four stories of the Mad Monk helping others, from saving a mother and daughter from crumbling walls, to helping hawkers deal with bullies, recovering stolen money for a young man and punishing a devious court official and his son.

programme.title: The 14 Amazons
programme.desc: The Yang family had served their country in Song Dynasty for generations. When General Yang is ambushed and killed during the war in Jin Shan, the grand matriarch led the entire family to take revenge and defend the country.

programme.title: Sunset
programme.desc: Teenage heart-throbs Ching Li and Paul Chin Pei come across like Annette Funicello and Frankie Avalon in the musical Sunset, a musical romp that plays similar to one of Hollywood's famous "Beach Party" movies. A car load of girls meets a car load of boys, and Ching and Paul ultimately fall in love. Yet the film takes an acrid twist and turns out to be more like a Shakespearian tragedy than a beach-babe party.

programme.title: The Shadow Whip
programme.desc: Three hundred thousand worth of silver is robbed by a thief using a whip as the weapon. As it is a signature weapon used by a martial arts master "Shadow Whip", he is suspected and hunted. No one sees him after that. Fifteen years later, a young girl Yang shows up using the same weapon. Who is this girl and what has happened to "Shadow Whip"?

programme.title: Sweet And Wild
programme.desc: Fang is a spunky young village girl who is not afraid to fight back against hooligans. She gets into trouble with the biggest hoodlum Tong when she foils his plans with a maid, causing Tong to plot a revenge. Luckily a man whom she is attracted to, Hai, comes in time to her rescue. Can they fight back?

programme.title: The Crimson Charm
programme.desc: Yu Fang Fang survives the massacre of her master's family at the hands of the Crimson Charm gang but loses her arm in the process. Determined, she vows to team up with a swordsman seeking revenge against the ruthless gang.

programme.title: The Tiger And The Widow
programme.desc: The Liu Chia-liang trained Hui Ying-hung was considered the top action martial arts female star in the 1980s. It is her martial arts abilities that Michelle Yeoh tries to emulate. In The Tiger and the Widow, Hui Ying-hung is somehow mixed up in a salt smuggling ring that stinks of missing persons and rotten dilemmas.

programme.title: The Winged Tiger
programme.desc: If the two big villains Winged Tiger and Underworld King join forces, the martial arts world will be plunged into chaos. This evil union is set to occur with the marriage of the Underworld King's sister and the Winged Tiger. Can this dangerous duo be stopped before one says "I do"?

programme.title: The Mermaid
programme.desc: Zhang and Jin's daughter, Peony, are betrothed at birth but Jin objects to the engagement now. Zhang meets a carp spirit that looks exactly like Peony and they fall in love. When Justice Bao is asked by Jin to distinguish Peony from her replica, he decides to quit the case when he witness the true love between Zhang and the carp spirit.

programme.title: Descendant Of The Sun
programme.desc: Shi Sheng is adopted by an old carpenter and grows up to possess extraordinary superpowers. One day, he unexpectedly discovers his identity as the son of the solar deity and learns that his power will be lost during solar eclipse. When an evil spirit appears and wreaks havoc, Shi Sheng must beat him in an ultimate duel to save the world.

programme.title: Mission Impossible
programme.desc: A sword master's daughter is pursued and poisoned by an evil master when bringing back the stolen Golden Sword to the palace. She dies on the run and returns as a spirit to take revenge by killing the evil master, and soon vanishes after returning the sword to the emperor.

programme.title: One Way Only
programme.desc: Danny is a motorbike workshop owner, once was a renowned motorcycle racer, but were seriously injured in an illegal race. Mai, student of Danny, wins a race in Macau under Danny's help. However, because of money and honour, Mai joins illegal races. After knowing this, Li persuades Mai to stop illegal races, but Mai seems cannot find his way out...

programme.title: Demon Of The Lute
programme.desc: Lute demon Chin Mo has reappeared in the world to wreak havoc. Hsiao Feng Ling is ordered to help find a special bow and arrows that can counter the demon. Only Chiao Yin knows the whereabouts of the weapon. Hsiao and her classmate Old Naughty set out on an arduous journey to find Chiao. After overcoming many obstacles, they catch Chin Mo's man trying to snatch the bow and manage to stop him in time....

programme.title: Return Of The Phoenix
programme.desc: An imperial minister Cheng betroths his pretty younger daughter, Ye, to his friend's son, Mu. His wife however, refuses to let Ye marry before her elder daughter Yan, who is ugly and undesirable. Yan is asked to pretend as Ye to meet Mu but scares him away. A rich guy who likes Ye meanwhile pretends as Mu to attend the wedding...

programme.title: All Men Are Brothers
programme.desc: This is a sequel to Chang Cheh's epic "The Water Margin", and follows the patriotic story of seven warriors in the band of 108 outlaws at Mount Liang. The magnificent seven battle against the despotic government officials to save their country.

programme.title: The Human Goddess
programme.desc: This is a love story between an alluring fairy, Seventh Sister, who comes down from heaven to experience life in 70's Hong Kong, and a man who is running a debt laden orphanage. A heartless tycoon plans to take over the orphanage for its land but has to deal with Seventh Sister's magical powers as she aims to protect it from falling into his hands!

programme.title: The Sword Stained With Royal Blood
programme.desc: Adapted from Jin Yong's novel, the movie depicts the havoc breaking out in the martial arts world when a warrior on the run uncovers a sword, a training manual, a treasure map and a secret message on the body of a deceased martial arts master.

programme.title: Guess Who Killed My Twelve Lovers?
programme.desc: Jenny Hu, Shaw Brothers' gorgeous Chinese-German star, was given her first comedy role in the wild and wacky Guess Who Killed My Twelve Lovers? Described as "a comedy of belly laughs and chilling murders", it is a unique entry in the Hong Kong theater of the absurd.

programme.title: The Boxer From The Temple
programme.desc: A young monk, The Kid, was expelled from the temple due to his crazy ways. After leaving the temple, he fights a cruel bandit's son and befriends a prostitute. As he fights for justice, his "Crazy Lo Han Fist" improves with every fight.

programme.title: Twinkle Twinkle Little Star
programme.desc: A beautiful but ignorant woman is abducted by aliens but nobody believes her close encounter. While planning a suicide to prove herself, she meets a failed detective who is also planning his suicide. They change their minds about dying after finding each other and start to encounter bizarre adventures, before falling in love with each other.

programme.title: Shaolin Mantis
programme.desc: The Emperor orders Feng to find proofs of Master Tian's rebellion in his house. Feng falls in love with Tian's granddaughter and marries her. When he finds the proofs and tries to leave with her, his wife is killed in the fight against Tian. Feng creates the mantis-style martial arts and vows to avenge her death.

programme.title: My Son
programme.desc: Kuo, a police's son, blames his father for his mother's death. He has no job, spends time in night clubs and always gets into fights. One night, Kuo rescues Mei from being raped and they become friends. Kuo wants to support Mei and her family so he goes gambling hoping to gain more money but bad luck seems to be following them with tragic outcomes.

programme.title: Hu's Travel Agency
programme.desc: Hu's Travel Agency features TV host Hu Gua with his children Hsiao-Chen and Hu Shih-An, running Taiwan's "most human-centered travel agency." Centered in Miaoli, they blend family bonds and local culture to create heartfelt journeys.

programme.title: Hu's Travel Agency
